description:
Transport a featherweight road bike or a snow-stomping fatbike. This rack can be folded upright, or tilted away from the car when you need access. The Lockable AutoAttach system ensures the rack is tight and stable, and 2 integrated cable locks secure bikes to the rack.

  • Updated design has integrated wheels, making getting your rack to-and-from the car easier
  • Fits bikes with wheels between 20 and 29in
  • Compatible with tires up to 5in. wide
  • Space between bikes allows use with multiple bike with Boost spacing and fatbikes
  • Tool-free installation and removal with Thule® AutoAttach system
  • Folds away when not in use, tilts for rear access when loaded
  • Bikes locks to rack, rack locks to vehicle
  • Contact-free attachment ensure no scratches to your bike
  • Bike side-to-side adjustment ensures maximum clearance
  • Max load is 60lb. per tray, 120lb. total
  • Increase capacity from 2 to 4 bikes by using the optional T2 Pro Bike Add-on. (May not accommodate 4 29'er bikes with 3in. tires or fat bikes with tires greater than 5in.)
name: Thule T2 Pro XTR 2-Bike Hitch Mount Rack - 2in. Receiver
